new_year.text: Nights will be dark but days will be light, wishing your life to be always bright. Happy New Year!

holi.text: May this festival of colors fill colors in your life. To every shade of you, I wish happy and colorful holi!

eid_mubarak.text: May the sweetness of sewaiyan stay in your mouth and in our relationship for years to come. Eid Mubarak!

independence_day.text: The bravery of our soldiers would not be wasted in the books of history or statues they would be cherished forever. Happy Independence Day!

dussehra.text: May this Dussehra burn all your worries with Ravana and bring you and your family Lots of Happiness. Happy Dussehra!

diwali.text: Many-many wishes for Diwali. May the divine lights of Diwali enlighten your home and life. Happy Diwali!

christmas.text: I have asked Santa to deliver to your home my warmest wishes for you and your family. Merry Christmas!

valentine_day.text: To my only love of life, my dream of having you by my side for entire life is finally going to be lived. Be my valentine forever? Happy  Valentines Day!

friendship_day.text: One of the best gifts of my life is having a true friend like you. Happy Friendship Day!

teachers_day.text: A teacher through his hard work and dedication makes the world a better place. Happy Teachers Day!

birthday.text: May the joy that you have spread in the past come back to you on this day. Wishing you a very Happy Birthday.

anniversary.text: Sending love and good wishes to one of our all-time favorite couples. Happy Anniversary!
